title: lag spike after 9.3 patch
body: Am I the only one having the problem or if anyone has the same problem? In game, my ping spike from 20 to 300 for a second of two from time to time after the patch.

replies.body: Been happening a lot to me too. You're not the only one.

you are not the only one, it's disgusting... 2s freeze and then everything that has been happening in these 2 seconds instantly appears on the screen. 
It titlts even more than the minion team"mates"
